title: Can we buff DFG?
body:
This item is literally useless and may as well not be in the game. It does NOTHING for any champion.

Just lost a game because my mid laner insisted on building it first.  I swear 800 elo is elo hell.

replies.body:
lmao people downvoting and not saying why.

stay classy.

pls buff



and nerf ao shin
i think there are some downvote bots on these forums tonight
